author: neels
msg: Creating micro-branch diff-repos-wc.
The intention is, specifically, to enable summarizing diff between
repos <> wc, and to successfully use that in a new function dirs_same_p()
which compares arbitrary directories.
dirs_same_p() in turn is to be used in merge to check that source and target
are identical before merging a directory delete, and to raise a tree-conflict
otherwise.
Also, changes to the diff framework as it is may be necessary or desirable,
like fixing current diff errors.
As a spinoff, summarizing diff between repos and wc has been greeted as a
feature GUI clients would greatly benefit from.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri-test.c
(test_dirent_get_absolute): Following up on r33589, fix comment.

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri-test.c
(test_dirent_get_absolute): Following up on r33444 and r33451, added Windows
specific tests on "/" and "/x/abc".

author: lgo
msg: Reimplement canonicalize without the use of apr_uri_parse and
apr_uri_unparse, which turned out to be way too slow for our purposes.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri.c
(canonicalize): Reimplement the part that canonicalizes URLs.

author: lgo
msg: Make svn_uri_is_canonical support the Windows-specific 'drive-letter is
capital letter in file URLs' rule. This makes the testsuite pass again on
Windows.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri.c
(svn_uri_is_canonical): Add Windows specific check.
